meanings.definition: Hit or strike with a club.
meanings.sent1: He clubbed the ball during the game.
meanings.sent2: The lumberjack clubbed the tree to chop it down.
meanings.sent3: The chef clubbed the dough to make it smooth and even.
meanings.sent4: The waves clubbed against the shore relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: She clubbed the nail into the wall with a hammer.

meanings.definition: Gathered or formed into a club shape.
meanings.sent1: The clubbed mushrooms grew in a tight cluster.
meanings.sent3: The clubbed leaves on the tree looked like a bouquet.
meanings.sent4: The clubbed petals of the flower created a unique pattern.
meanings.sent5: The clubbed roots of the plant spread out like fingers.

meanings.definition: Joined or associated with a club.
meanings.sent1: She was a clubbed member of the photography club.
meanings.sent2: The clubbed students enjoyed exclusive benefits.
meanings.sent3: The clubbed team celebrated their victory together.
meanings.sent4: The clubbed guests received special invitations.
meanings.sent5: He felt proud to be a clubbed participant in the event.
